name: Quick, Run To The Next Battery Pack Before Your Torch Runs Out And You Are Left In Darkness!
name_original: Quick, Run To The Next Battery Pack Before Your Torch Runs Out And You Are Left In Darkness!
description:
Quick, Run To The Next Battery Pack Before Your Torch Runs Out And You Are Left In Darkness!, or QRTTNBPBYTROAYALID!, is an infinite runner  - get to the next set of batteries before your torch runs out, leaving you in darkness! We’re planning on polishing after deadline so follow us @dwarph or @spacebabedev on twitter for updates!

Controls: 

Press space to jump!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 39, rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/qrttnbpbytroayalid !
